Hospitals in Canada allow visits from on: contradicting the claim that parents cannot visit COVID-19 infected children.
Quebec: s largest hospital network, the CHU de Québec-Université Laval, stated that no policy supports the claim made in the social media post.
In Ontario: only one adult caregiver per patient is allowed in the hospital, according to new COVID-19 rules at Sick Kids, a pediatric hospital in Toronto.
Alberta Health Services allows exception: permitting one visitor at a time, with the possibility of approving two visitors in rare situations on a case-by-case basis.
